title: 50 years as a Jesuit priest on a mission of redemption, and the homies say thanks to Father Greg
dc:creator: Steve Lopez
description: Father Greg Boyle, founder of the Homeboy gang member redirection program, marks 50 years of service.
content:encoded: Father Greg Boyle, founder of the Homeboy gang member redirection program, marks 50 years of service.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA - OCTOBER 28, 2022 - - Robert Trejo, 32, right, receives a blessing from Father Greg Boyle, founder and director of Homeboy Industries, in Boyle's office at Homeboy Industries in downtown Los Angeles on October 28, 2022. Father Greg spends the mornings counseling constituents, offering direction and assistance to former gang members. For over 30 years Homeboy Industries has offered programs to assist high-risk youth, former gang members and the recently incarcerated with a variety of free programs, such as mental health counseling, legal services, tattoo removal, curriculum and education classes, work-readiness training, and employment services. (Genaro Molina / Los Angeles Times)
